tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We have been going to Dr.Meghna Manocha for years now - for both our sons, one is 10 and the other 5. I don't know what I would do had she not been around. She is SO good. I trust her implicitly, and whenever I have had any doubt about any medical issues with my kids, I have gone to her and been relieved about my kids being in the best of care. 

A couple of times when due to the distance and immediate requirement I had to go to someone else, I remember how I could only rest assured when we saw her after a couple of days anyway. She is just very very nice as a person and as a doctor, she is professional, and thorough but in such an easy-going manner. The combination is so calming for parents, and so relieving to know that your kids are in the best of care. Besides all this, my kids love her.

My older son was born under Dr.Arvind Shenoi's care and I am ever ever grateful to him, I look up to him and admire his skill. Having Dr.Meghna on his team just re-affirms my trust, they are the best.

Thank you Dr.Meghna, just a few words aren't enough to let you know how grateful we are as parents. What you do every single day is simply wonderful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ** * *** *** ** **** Always obliged to her. How I can thank her I don't know. Since 4yrs I prefer her only. Last time how she helped I can't forget in my life. 
My kid fail down and got hurt in the forehead. By consulting near by hospital (speciality hospital) a dr I gave medicine. But thn my kid had diarrhea and vomitting. We did ultrasound. After 2times of ultrasound the dr told that some obstacle is thr in kid's stomach so meed to do citiscan and surgery. I was schocked and thank god before further process I was to be sure by consulting another hospital.
Whn I reached cloudnine dr Meghna's consultation time was over. So in emergency I consulted another dr. But I was praying to see once her. And thanks to god and her whn she came to emergency room I was so happy that my tension went. She was so humble even her dutu time was over she checked my kid and as my kid was passing motion and gas so she told nothing to b worried. Thn there again we did ultrasound and it was gastric no obstacle. After this also she personally waited for another 2hrs to further consult senior specialist and when everything clarified as normal thn only she went. 

I am really thankful to you dr Meghna how I became relaxed when you told no surgery required which was earlier told by other dr.  You treat patients like family not just like others.So everytime I prefer you snd also advise others. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We have been visiting doctor Meghna for last 7 years *** *** ***** ******* *** *********** ********* **** *** ***** ************ **** ** **** *** ** ***** ****. We feel its her passion towards profession that drives this excellence. Can not thank her enough for the critical diagnosis that she made in case of our 1.5 year old child that too in a very short time span. She made us understand the urgency of the matter and for that she gave us time on Sunday despite being holiday for her. Her profession for her is way beyond just the duty as a doctor. She simply loves her little patients.
Everytime we visit her, there is always an assurance that our little kids are in extremely safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Wonderful at putting the child and mother at ease.Never overreacts to any medical situation.Is articulate, friendly and very reassuring..
I always look forward to meeting Dr.Manocha because I know my child is in the hands of a thorough professional.
Thank you so much Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I took my 2 yr kid to dr meghna for some skin allergy issue. she was available when we reached there. My wife went inside while I was gettting billing done at the counter. She refused to answer any general question of my wife until billing was done. She kept asking the doctors we visited in last one year or so which obviously we didnt remember. She was like she was doing a great favor to us by being avaialble during corona time, that is okay and I agree. *** *** ********* *** ********* *** **** ****** ** **** ***** *** ***** **** ********** *** no value for the time spent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Meghana, is a great doctor . She has been very helpful and very approachable in all 3 + years we have been consulting her for our daughter. She is very friendly to kids and very guiding to parents.We as parents feel comfortable discussing all our issues and concerns. She listens with patience and her guidance helps us a lot.
She was recommended to us by a close friend and we gladly recommend her to others.

She really takes care of all your queries and concerns with utmost patience and excellence. *** *********** *** ********* *** **** ******* *** **** ****

review: I have experienced that many people take an appointment and arrive as late as 2 hours from the appointed time and yet they get preference over people who have reached the clinic at their given appointment time causing delays for no fault of their own. What is the point of taking appointment then? If someone misses their appointment by a large margin; shouldn't you cancel it?

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Will never recommend this doctor. 
My First & Last visit ever.
Forced for IV, pressurised to admit in hospital, made recommendations to go to another hospital.
Made us write a refusal consent that she is not responsible if things go out of hand. 
Created unnecessary havoc and tried to bring the roof down just for usual cough and cold with mild wheezing. She gave 3 back to back nebulization to my daughter. 
****** ***** **** **** ******* ****** *** *** ***** **** ***** *** ***** *** ***** **** ** ***** ** *** **** ******* ***** *** *** * **** **** 
We refused and went for a 2nd opinion. ** *** **** * **** *** *** ** **** ** ********* **** **** ***** *****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
She was extremely helpful and knew all about the procedures and vaccinations. she took her time to fill out all the forms and made sure we had the correct vaccinations. She was wonderful with my 18 year old daughter and put her at her ease. She listened to all the previous history and gave us recommendations to move forward.  She even gave me her email id in case I had any questions and responded within a few hours when I wrote to her and asked for a clarification.  

I highly recommend her - she was really fantastic.
Feel lucky to have made the appointment by chance.

Warmest regards
Shonali

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

I would recommend the doctor for most accurate diagnosis (better than top paediatricians in Bengaluru) and appropriate treatment method. She also educates on further prevention of the disease which most doctors won't do. 
Thank you doctor.
